title: Understanding the Role of Instructional Designers in Medical Education and Its Field Application

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design concepts and general understanding of medical education environments
context.additional_context: Learners are primarily office/administrative workers accessing content in smartphone-based limited environments, required to demonstrate learning outcomes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Three or more core roles of instructional designers in medical education environments can be explained
Educational needs can be diagnosed using surveys and quantitative/qualitative analysis methods
Two or more online instructional design strategies tailored to large learner groups can be proposed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
